title: (x) Christian Book Store - Worcester Round {Yves}
content:
Quality is not good, but can someone suggest a similar font if not the name of this one?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070628233602im_/http:/typophile.com/files/christian.jpg)

author: evan
